name: DailySignal
text:
Rutgers University's latest change makes the racist assumption that minorities cannot comprehend traditional English.

Speech pathologist Leonydus Johnson called that “insulting, patronizing, and in itself, extremely racist.” https://t.co/Dj24A3zhSF

name: DailySignal
text: The deceptively false glamour of socialism is a mirage that each new generation will be tempted to run toward—unless they are told the truth about socialism’s true legacy. https://t.co/duaSTQvBas
